metadata.title: The sequence of human ACE2 is suboptimal for binding the S spike protein of SARS coronavirus 2

abstract.original_text: The rapid and escalating spread of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 6 poses an immediate public health emergency. The viral spike protein S binds ACE2 7 on host cells to initiate molecular events that release the viral genome 8
